title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competency: Customized Science Learning Through Creativity-Based Large-Scale Assessment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Students can design three or more creative approaches to solve complex scientific problems.
Learners can systematically document and analyze their problem-solving processes in a digital portfolio.
Students can improve their creative outputs two or more times based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
